data.prayer: Father, help your children in Chatham Islands, New Zealand find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chatham Islands, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Chatham Islands.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Chatham Islands, New Zealand so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Chatham Islands.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Khmer people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, we pray that the people of Chatham Islands, New Zealand will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Chatham Islands.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, help the 106 believers in Chatham Islands to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 494 lost friends and neighbors.
